channel.title: My Boss will not drop items after editing?
channel.description:
Hey, got a little problem here. I have been editing a new boss with a new location and a new tele. Everything has been going fine. Finally, I edited the bosses item drops in the npcdrops.tsm or whatever it is. After editing it, I threw some partyhats and masks into the drops and changed the drop rate to 25 percent. Here is what the code looks like
#general graardor 6260:25 1149:1 830:5 1079:1 886:100 1608:3 11712:1 11728:1 11714:1 995:100000000 11724:1 11704:1 11710:1 989:1 6585:1 1038:1 1040:1 1042:1 1044:1 1046:1 1048:1 1053:1 1055:1 1057:1
Anyone have any idea? Any help would be very appreciated. Thanks.
{EDIT} None of the npc's drop items now. I have killed 10 different npc's and no items drop. Please help

item.title: My Boss will not drop items after editing?
item.dc:creator: @French_Fries French Fries
item.description:
@French_Fries wrote:

This may not work but are the codes a tab away from eachother?

Read full topic

item.title: My Boss will not drop items after editing?
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Shawskee:

Do you know how to fix it? I can show codes. I only messed with the general graardor drop items in the Npcdrops.tsm

Yeah yeah just edit the drops one item at a time and test to see if it worked. I ended up making dust devils drop godsword sets lol

Read full topic

Hey, got a little problem here. I have been editing a new boss with a new location and a new tele. Everything has been going fine.
